description: Sea Thrift (Armeria maritima 'Morning Star White') is an amazing plant that displays stunning, white flowers, which makes it great for bringing light and vibrancy to your garden. Its low-growing habit makes it perfect for ground cover, edging, rock gardens, and pathways. It's salt-tolerant and deer-resistant, making it a great garden option for coastal locations. Its foliage is a vibrant green and produces lovely white flowers from early summer to fall, bringing color to your garden all summer long. Sea Thrift is a durable and reliable plant that is easy to maintain and can easily thrive in an array of soil conditions. This beautiful plant is truly an amazing addition to any garden.
